report.title: Species & occurrence counts by user
report.description: Lists users and the number of species and occurrences entered by each of them.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN users u on u.id=o.created_by_id WHERE (o.zero_abundance='f' OR o.id IS NULL) AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating the current user.

column.name: me
column.sql: case cast(u.id as character varying) when '#currentUser#' then 'me' else 'other' end
